courseDetails.overview: This course introduces cloud computing with Microsoft Azure. You’ll explore Azure services, architecture, management tools, and cost models—building a solid foundation for cloud careers.

title: MS-AZ900T00- Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
description: Learn the fundamentals of Microsoft Azure, including cloud concepts, core services, pricing, and governance. Perfect for beginners preparing for the AZ-900 certification exam.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches the fundamentals of PowerShell for Windows Server automation. You’ll create and manage scripts, handle system configurations, and perform advanced administrative tasks with ease.

title: MS-AZ040T00- Automating Administration with  PowerShell
description: Learn to automate administrative tasks in Windows Server using PowerShell. Build scripts, manage systems, and streamline workflows efficiently in enterprise environments.

courseDetails.overview: This course covers core Azure administration tasks—managing compute, networking, storage, and security. Learn to implement, monitor, and maintain Microsoft Azure environments effectively.

title: MS-AZ104T00- Microsoft Azure Administrator
description: Develop the skills to manage and monitor Azure resources, identities, and storage. Prepare for the AZ-104 certification and become a proficient Azure Administrator.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches IT pros to migrate and run SAP solutions on Azure. Covers VM sizing, storage, networking, authentication, backup, and disaster recovery for SAP on Azure.

title: MS-AZ120T00-  Planning and Deploying SAP on Azure
description: Explore how to plan, deploy, and manage SAP workloads on Microsoft Azure. Learn infrastructure design, identity integration, and monitoring strategies for enterprise-grade SAP systems.

courseDetails.overview: This course trains Azure admins to deliver virtual desktops and apps on Azure. Includes networking, image creation, automation, and optimization for multi-session environments.

title: MS-AZ140T00 - Configure and Operate Microsoft Azure Virtual Desktop
description: Learn to deploy and manage Azure Virtual Desktop environments. Covers host pool setup, session host creation, FSLogix configuration, and performance monitoring for remote desktop solutions.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches developers to create Azure Functions, manage web apps, secure solutions with KeyVault, and integrate services using event-driven models and third-party APIs.

title: MS-AZ204T00-  Develop Solutions for Microsoft Azure
description: Master Azure development by building scalable cloud apps. Learn compute, storage, security, and integration techniques to create robust, end-to-end solutions using Microsoft Azure services.

courseDetails.overview: This course trains solution architects to evaluate business needs and design Azure-based solutions. Includes case studies on architecture principles, hybrid setups, and multi-cloud integration.

title: MS-AZ305T00- Design Microsoft Azure Infrastructure Solutions
description: Learn to design secure, scalable Azure infrastructure. Covers governance, compute, storage, networking, identity, business continuity, and migration strategies for enterprise cloud solutions.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches DevOps engineers to design and implement DevOps strategies on Azure. Covers Git, CI/CD, containers, secrets management, release workflows, and feedback optimization.

title: MS-AZ400T00- Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps solutions
description: Gain expertise in DevOps practices using Azure. Learn to plan, implement CI/CD pipelines, manage source control, automate deployments, and monitor applications for continuous delivery.

courseDetails.overview: This course equips security professionals to manage Azure security posture, configure access controls, protect workloads, and use tools like Azure Defender and Sentinel for threat mitigation.

title: MS-AZ500T00- Microsoft Azure Security Technologies
description: Learn to secure Azure environments by implementing identity, platform, data, and application protection. Gain skills in threat detection, incident response, and security operations.

courseDetails.overview: This course trains network engineers to build and manage Azure networks. Covers virtual networks, VPNs, ExpressRoute, traffic control, network security, and performance monitoring.

title: MS-AZ700T00- Design and Implement Microsoft Azure Network Solutions
description: Master Azure networking by designing and implementing secure, scalable infrastructure. Learn hybrid connectivity, routing, load balancing, and private access to Azure services.

courseDetails.overview: This course trains IT pros to deploy, configure, and secure Windows Server in hybrid setups. Focuses on integrating cloud services, managing virtual machines, and ensuring infrastructure resilience.

title: MS-AZ800T00- Administer Windows Server Hybrid Core Infrastructure
description: Learn to manage Windows Server workloads in hybrid environments. Covers identity, compute, networking, and storage using on-premises tools and Azure services like Arc and Automanage.

courseDetails.overview: This course trains IT pros to manage Windows Server workloads across on-premises and Azure. Focuses on hybrid capabilities, securing VMs, troubleshooting, and implementing resilient infrastructure.

title: MS-AZ801T00- Configure Windows Server Hybrid Advanced Services
description: Learn to configure advanced Windows Server services in hybrid environments. Covers Azure integration, VM migration, security, high availability, and disaster recovery strategies.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches secure workload access using Azure networking. Covers VNet peering, NSGs, Azure Firewall, DNS, and routing to build resilient, protected cloud infrastructures.

title: MS-AZ1002- Configure secure access to your workloads using networking with Azure Virtual Network
description: Learn to secure Azure workloads by designing virtual networks, configuring firewalls, and implementing access controls. Ideal for IT pros managing hybrid and cloud network environments.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to create storage accounts, containers, and file shares. You’ll configure encryption, shared access signatures, and network rules to protect Azure storage resources.

title: MS-AZ1003- Secure storage for Azure Files and Azure Blob Storage
description: Learn to securely store business data using Azure Files and Blob Storage. Covers account setup, encryption, access control, and networking to strengthen your cloud storage posture.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches IT pros to implement Azure Monitor, set up Log Analytics, configure Application Insights, and automate responses to performance issues across Azure environments.

title: MS-AZ1004- Deploy and configure Azure Monitor
description: Learn to deploy Azure Monitor to track performance, health, and usage across cloud resources. Configure alerts, dashboards, and insights for proactive infrastructure monitoring.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches IT pros to configure SAP environments in Azure. Includes hands-on labs for deploying virtual machines, networks, storage, and integrating with Microsoft Entra ID.

title: MS-AZ1006- Migrate and Modernize SAP in the Microsoft Cloud
description: Learn to migrate and modernize SAP workloads using Azure. Covers VM setup, networking, storage, identity, backup, disaster recovery, and monitoring with Azure Center for SAP solutions.

courseDetails.overview: This course trains Azure admins to configure Linux VMs, automate tasks, optimize performance, and implement high-availability and security in hybrid cloud environments.

title: MS-AZ1007- Deploy and administer Linux virtual machines on Azure
description: Learn to deploy and manage Linux VMs in Azure. Covers VM creation, storage access, monitoring, alerts, and backup strategies for secure and efficient Linux workload administration.

courseDetails.overview: This course trains IT pros to administer AD DS environments. Includes configuring authentication, authorization, Group Policy, and maintaining domain controllers in hybrid infrastructures.

title: MS-AZ1008- Administer Active Directory Domain Services
description: Learn to deploy, manage, and secure Active Directory Domain Services. Covers domain controllers, Group Policy, user and group management, and hybrid identity integration with Azure AD.

courseDetails.overview: This course trains IT pros to manage hybrid servers with Azure Arc. Includes setup, update management, governance policies, and monitoring using Azure tools across diverse environments.

title: MS-AZ1010- Deploy and manage Azure Arc-enabled Servers
description: Learn to extend Azure management to on-premises and multi-cloud servers using Azure Arc. Covers deployment, updates, policy enforcement, and security integration with Defender for Cloud.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to secure CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps. Includes hands-on labs for access control, secure variables, identity management, and extending pipeline functionality.

title: MS-AZ2001- Implement security through a pipeline using Azure DevOps
description: Learn to secure Azure DevOps pipelines by configuring access, validating permissions, managing identities, and applying governance. Ideal for DevOps and security professionals.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches DevOps engineers to implement continuous integration and delivery. Includes pipeline creation, artifact management, approvals, and environment configuration

title: MS-AZ2002- Develop an ASP.NET Core web app that consumes an API
description: Learn to build and manage CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps. Covers source control, build automation, release strategies, and deployment to Azure services for streamlined delivery.

title: MS-AZ2003- Deploy cloud-native apps using Azure Container Apps
description: Learn to deploy and manage application infrastructure in Azure. Covers compute, networking, storage, and monitoring to support scalable, secure, and resilient cloud-based applications.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to connect apps to Azure OpenAI, create plugins, and implement planners using Semantic Kernel. Includes hands-on labs for building AI-powered agent workflows

description: Learn to build intelligent agents using Azure OpenAI and Semantic Kernel SDK. Ideal for C# developers integrating LLMs into apps for planning, reasoning, and natural language tasks.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches developers to use Azure OpenAI for generative AI. Includes hands-on labs for prompt design, model tuning, and building intelligent apps with GPT-based capabilities.

title: MS-AZ2006- Automate Azure Load Testing by using GitHub Actions
description: Learn to build generative AI apps using Azure OpenAI. Covers prompt engineering, model deployment, and integrating LLMs into applications for natural language and content generation.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to use GitHub Copilot to generate code, documentation, unit tests, and improvements. Includes hands-on labs for integrating Copilot into real-world workflows.

description: Learn to boost coding productivity using GitHub Copilot and Copilot Chat in Visual Studio Code. Ideal for developers seeking AI-assisted development and faster feature delivery

title: MS-AZ2008- DevOps Foundations:  The Core Principals and Practices
description: Learn to build cloud-native AI applications using Azure services. Covers container apps, Azure AI services, and GitHub Copilot for scalable, intelligent app development.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to integrate Azure OpenAI with LangChain. Includes hands-on labs for building RAG pipelines, chaining prompts, and deploying scalable AI-powered applications.

title: MS-AZ2010- Designing and Implementing Platform Engineering
description: Learn to build generative AI apps using Azure OpenAI and LangChain. Ideal for Python developers creating intelligent agents with retrieval-augmented generation and prompt chaining.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches GitHub admins to configure access, enforce compliance, manage teams, and optimize collaboration. Includes hands-on labs for GitHub Enterprise setup and governance.

title: MS-GH900T00- GitHub Foundations
description: Learn to administer GitHub Enterprise environments. Covers user management, repository policies, security settings, and integration with DevOps workflows across organizations.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches the basics of GitHub for developers and teams. Covers GitHub Flow, issues, project boards, and collaboration tools to manage and track code changes effectively

title: MS-GH100T00- GitHub fundamentals - Administration basics and product features
description: Learn GitHub fundamentals including repositories, branches, commits, and pull requests. Ideal for beginners starting with version control and collaborative software development.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to build and manage workflows with GitHub Actions. Includes hands-on labs for automating builds, tests, deployments, and managing secrets and environments.

title: MS-GH200T00- Automate your workflow with GitHub Actions
description: Learn to automate software workflows using GitHub Actions. Covers CI/CD pipelines, workflow syntax, triggers, and integrating actions into DevOps processes for faster delivery.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to implement GitHub security features. Includes hands-on labs for configuring scans, managing vulnerabilities, and enforcing policies across repositories.

title: MS-GH500T00- GitHub Advanced Security
description: Learn to secure your software supply chain using GitHub Advanced Security. Covers secret scanning, code scanning, and dependency management for enterprise-grade protection.

title: MS-DP900T00- Introduction to Microsoft Azure Data
description: Learn core data concepts and how they’re implemented using Microsoft Azure. Ideal for beginners exploring relational, non-relational, big data, and analytics solutions in the cloud.

description: Learn to query and modify data using Transact-SQL. Ideal for data professionals working with SQL Server or Azure SQL to retrieve, filter, and manipulate relational data.

description: Learn to build, train, and deploy machine learning models using Azure Machine Learning. Ideal for data scientists working with Python and cloud-based ML workflows

description: Learn to build and deploy generative AI solutions using Azure Databricks. Covers LLMs, RAG workflows, fine-tuning, and responsible AI practices for enterprise-scale applications.

description: Learn to build cloud-native applications using Azure Cosmos DB. Covers data modeling, partitioning, indexing, and SDK operations for scalable NoSQL solutions.

description: Learn to design, load, monitor, and query data warehouses using Microsoft Fabric. Ideal for data engineers and analysts building scalable, secure, and performant analytics solutions.

title: MS-MS4007- Microsoft 365  Copilot User Enablement Specialist
description: Learn to drive adoption of Microsoft 365 Copilot across your organization. Ideal for business leaders, consultants, and service adoption specialists guiding Copilot rollout and usage.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to create declarative agents with Visual Studio Code and Teams Toolkit. Topics include API plugins, adaptive cards, authentication, and Microsoft Graph integration.

title: MS-MS4010- Extend Microsoft 365 Copilot with declarative agents by using Visual Studio Code
description: Learn to build plugins and connectors for Microsoft 365 Copilot using declarative agents. Ideal for developers extending Copilot functionality across Microsoft 365 apps.

courseDetails.overview: This course introduces Copilot architecture, declarative and custom engine agents, Microsoft Graph connectors, and Copilot Studio. Includes labs on agent design, deployment, and admin center tools.

title: MS-MS4014- Build a foundation to build AI agents and extend Microsoft 365 Copilot
description: Learn the fundamentals of Microsoft 365 Copilot extensibility. Ideal for developers and app makers exploring how to build AI agents and integrate external data using plugins and connectors.

courseDetails.overview: This course covers Teams AI Library, Azure OpenAI integration, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and Teams Toolkit. Includes labs on bot design, deployment, and Copilot extensibility.

title: MS-MS4015- Build custom agents for Microsoft Teams
description: Learn to build intelligent Microsoft Teams apps using AI and LLMs. Ideal for developers creating custom agents that extend Microsoft 365 Copilot and enhance collaboration.

courseDetails.overview: This course covers Copilot setup, licensing, data readiness, SharePoint Advanced Management, and security. It also introduces extensibility concepts and adoption strategies.

title: MS-MS4017- Manage and extend Microsoft 365 Copilot
description: Learn to implement, administer, and extend Microsoft 365 Copilot. Ideal for IT professionals and administrators preparing environments and exploring extensibility options.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches prompt flows across Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and Teams. Includes Copilot Chat, and explores differences between enterprise and web-grounded data.

title: MS-MS4018- Draft, analyze, and present with Microsoft 365 Copilot
description: Learn to use Microsoft 365 Copilot to draft documents, analyze data, and create presentations. Ideal for business users seeking hands-on experience with AI-powered productivity tools.

courseDetails.overview: This course introduces Microsoft prebuilt agents and teaches how to build, manage, and share no-code agents. Includes hands-on labs with Copilot Chat, SharePoint, and Power Automate integration.

title: MS-MS4019- Transform your everyday business processes with agents
description: Learn to create and manage no-code agents in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat and SharePoint. Ideal for business users seeking to automate tasks and streamline collaboration.

courseDetails.overview: This course covers Windows Autopilot, Microsoft Intune, co-management, app deployment, identity protection, compliance policies, and Microsoft Defender for Endpoint.

title: MS-MD102T00- Microsoft 365 Endpoint Administrator
description: Learn to plan, deploy, and manage modern endpoints using Microsoft 365 tools. Ideal for IT professionals managing devices, apps, identities, and security in hybrid environments.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to configure Intune, apply security baselines, implement compliance policies, and use Copilot for Security to detect and respond to threats with AI-driven insights.

title: MS-MD4011- Enhance Endpoint Security with Microsoft Intune and Microsoft Copilot for Security
description: Learn to secure, manage, and monitor endpoints using Microsoft Intune and Copilot for Security. Ideal for IT professionals and security analysts enhancing device protection and threat response.

courseDetails.overview: This course introduces Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, Power Virtual Agents, and Dataverse. Includes hands-on labs for app creation, data visualization, and chatbot design.

title: MS-PL900T00- Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals
description: Learn the business value and capabilities of Microsoft Power Platform. Ideal for users and analysts seeking to automate processes, analyze data, and build low-code solutions.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to configure Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Power Virtual Agents. Includes requirement gathering, solution design, data modeling, and user experience optimization.

title: MS-PL200T00- Microsoft Power Platform Functional Consultant (Incl Applied Workshop)
description: Learn to design, implement, and manage Power Platform solutions. Ideal for functional consultants who translate business needs into scalable, low-code apps and automations.

courseDetails.overview: This course covers data preparation, modeling, visualization, and analysis in Power BI. Includes hands-on labs for DAX, paginated reports, row-level security, and dashboard deployment.

title: MS-PL300T00- Design and Manage Analytics Solutions Using Power BI
description: Learn to model, visualize, and analyze data using Power BI. Ideal for data analysts and business intelligence professionals seeking to deliver actionable insights from diverse data sources.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to build Power Apps, automate flows, extend Dataverse, and integrate with Azure and REST APIs. Includes ALM practices, custom UX, and secure system integrations.

title: MS-PL400T00- Microsoft Power Platform Developer (Incl Applied Workshop)
description: Learn to design, develop, secure, and troubleshoot Power Platform solutions. Ideal for developers building advanced apps, automations, and integrations using code-first techniques.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to design, develop, troubleshoot, and deploy RPA solutions using Power Automate. Includes hands-on labs with desktop flows, AI Builder, and integration with Microsoft 365.

title: MS-PL500T00- Microsoft Power Automate RPA Developer (Incl Applied Workshop)
description: Learn to automate repetitive tasks using Power Automate’s RPA capabilities. Ideal for developers building desktop and cloud flows to streamline business processes.

courseDetails.overview: This advanced course covers architecture decisions, security, integrations, Power Apps and Power Automate design, and governance. Prepares learners for the Solution Architect Expert certification

title: MS-PL600T00- Microsoft Power Platform Solution Architect (Incl Applied Workshop)
description: Learn to lead successful Power Platform implementations. Ideal for solution architects responsible for designing, deploying, and adopting scalable business solutions.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to create custom data models, connect external data sources, design user interfaces, and publish canvas apps. Includes hands-on labs and guided exercises.

title: MS-PL7001- Create and Manage Canvas Apps with Power Apps
description: Learn to build and manage canvas apps using Power Apps. Ideal for business users and developers seeking low-code solutions to streamline processes and improve data interaction.

courseDetails.overview: This course covers creating triggers, configuring actions, implementing conditions, testing flows, and managing approvals in Power Automate. Includes hands-on labs and real-world scenarios.

title: MS-PL7002- Create and Manage Automated Processes by using Power Automate
description: Learn to automate business processes using Power Automate. Ideal for professionals seeking to streamline workflows with cloud flows, approvals, and conditional logic.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to create Dataverse tables, design model-driven apps, and configure forms, charts, and dashboards. Includes hands-on labs and real-world business scenarios.

title: MS-PL7003- Create and Manage Model-Driven Apps with Power Apps and Dataverse
description: Learn to build scalable model-driven apps using Power Apps and Dataverse. Ideal for business users and app makers familiar with data modeling and low-code development.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to create, manage, and deploy custom copilots. Includes generative AI integration, Power Automate and Dataverse for Teams, and hands-on labs for conversational design.

title: MS-PL7008- Create agents in Microsoft Copilot Studio
description: Learn to build intelligent conversational agents using Microsoft Copilot Studio. Ideal for app makers and developers integrating generative AI into business workflows.

courseDetails.overview: This course introduces core SCI concepts and Microsoft solutions across Azure and Microsoft 365. Topics include identity principles, access management, threat protection, and compliance solutions.

title: MS-SC900T00- Introduction to Microsoft Security, Compliance, and Identity
description: Gain foundational knowledge of Microsoft’s security, compliance, and identity (SCI) solutions. Ideal for beginners exploring how Microsoft protects cloud and hybrid environments.

courseDetails.overview: This advanced course teaches how to translate business requirements into security designs, implement Zero Trust architecture, and specify security for SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS models.

title: MS-SC100T00- Microsoft Cybersecurity Architect
description: Learn to design and evaluate cybersecurity strategies across Zero Trust, GRC, SecOps, and cloud infrastructure. Ideal for experienced professionals pursuing the Cybersecurity Architect Expert certification.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches threat mitigation using Microsoft security tools. Includes KQL for detection and reporting, incident response, automation, and integration with Copilot for Security.

title: MS-SC200T00- Microsoft Security Operations Analyst
description: Learn to investigate, respond to, and hunt for threats using Microsoft Sentinel, Defender XDR, and Defender for Cloud. Ideal for security analysts protecting hybrid and cloud environments.

courseDetails.overview: This course covers identity governance, secure authentication, access management, and app integration. Includes adaptive access, self-service capabilities, and monitoring tools.

title: MS-SC300T00- Microsoft Identity and Access Administrator
description: Learn to design, implement, and manage identity and access solutions using Microsoft Entra ID. Ideal for administrators securing authentication and access across Microsoft 365 and Azure.

courseDetails.overview: This course covers data loss prevention, insider risk management, information protection, retention policies, and AI data governance. Includes hands-on labs and real-world security scenarios.

title: MS-SC401T00- Information Security Administrator
description: Learn to protect sensitive data and manage risks using Microsoft Purview and Microsoft 365 tools. Ideal for security administrators responsible for data protection and compliance.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to create and configure Sentinel workspaces, connect data sources, build analytics rules, and automate threat responses using Microsoft’s cloud-native SIEM solution.

title: MS-SC5001- Configure SIEM security operations using Microsoft Sentinel
description: Learn to configure and manage SIEM operations using Microsoft Sentinel. Ideal for security analysts and IT professionals responsible for threat detection and response.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to apply Microsoft Cloud Security Benchmark controls, configure policies, and manage compliance using Defender for Cloud via the Azure portal. Includes hands-on labs and exercises.

title: MS-SC5002- Secure Azure services and workloads with Microsoft Defender for Cloud regulatory compliance
description: Learn to secure Azure services and workloads using Microsoft Defender for Cloud. Ideal for security professionals implementing regulatory compliance across hybrid and multicloud environments.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to create sensitive information types, apply sensitivity labels, configure auto-labeling, and implement DLP policies to prevent data leaks and ensure regulatory compliance.

title: MS-SC5003- Implement information protection and data loss prevention by using Microsoft Purview
description: Learn to safeguard sensitive data across Microsoft 365 using Microsoft Purview. Ideal for security administrators and compliance officers implementing data protection strategies.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to deploy Microsoft Defender for Endpoint, manage incidents in Defender XDR, and use Kusto Query Language (KQL) for advanced threat hunting and analytics.

title: MS-SC5004- Defend against cyberthreats with Microsoft Defender XDR
description: Learn to detect, investigate, and respond to cyberthreats using Microsoft Defender XDR. Ideal for security operations analysts managing incidents across endpoints and cloud environments.

courseDetails.overview: This course introduces Security Copilot’s core features, plugins, and AI-driven insights. Includes hands-on simulations for threat analysis, signal processing, and risk assessment.

title: MS-SC5006- Enhance security operations by using Microsoft Security Copilot
description: Explore how generative AI transforms security operations with Microsoft Security Copilot. Ideal for SOC analysts and security engineers seeking faster threat detection and response.

courseDetails.overview: This course teaches how to implement retention policies, configure Microsoft Purview eDiscovery (Standard and Premium), and manage communication compliance alerts and investigations.

title: MS-SC5007- Implement retention, eDiscovery, and Communication compliance in Microsoft Purview
description: Learn to manage data lifecycle, eDiscovery, and communication compliance using Microsoft Purview. Ideal for compliance officers and IT pros handling regulatory and legal data requirements.

courseDetails.overview: This course covers entitlement management, access reviews, terms of use, external user lifecycle, and privileged access strategies. Includes hands-on labs and monitoring with Log Analytics and Sentinel.

title: MS-SC5008- Configure and govern entitlement with Microsoft Entra ID
description: Learn to manage access and entitlements using Microsoft Entra ID. Ideal for identity and access administrators securing user lifecycle, privileged roles, and governance policies.
